entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • What's the status of x64 emulation effort? #28550
  • Would it be possible to pick a fix for https://github.com/microsoft/ApplicationInsights-dotnet/pull/2671? #28547
  • dotnet test with multiple TargetFrameworks while specifying --output #28542
  • It was not possible to find any installed .NET Core SDKs #28539
  • Rebuild fails when project with multiple TFMs references Source Code-only Nuget package #28549

Closed

  • Unable to build sdk.sln on the v6.0.402 tag due to missing packages and package downgrades causing errors NU1103, NU1603 and NU1605 #28531
  • dotnet nuget push not working after GitHub packages changes (10/10/22) #28545
  • [.NET 7 RC2]Broken build, CS8168 and CS8350 false alarms #28535

PullRequests

Created

  • Add new option for json output of dotnet list package #28564
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the sdk build to target net8.0 #28563
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #28558
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Adding some loc locked tags #28553
    Area-Infrastructure
  • The loc build changes didn't flow to main so going directly. #28552
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #28551
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1.4xx #28467
    Area-CodeFlow
  • Change the build machine to have a larger hard drive #28559
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [Internal to External Port] Templating Nuget Config Changes, MSBuild #28548
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-NuGet, Priority:0, Area-dotnet new
  • Trusted roots: 2022-09 CTL #28541
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2019767 #28500
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #28521
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Improve the example with specified language when language option is given with invalid option #28135
    Area-dotnet new
  • Trusted roots: 2022-09 CTL #28512
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Allow building with PublishAot set #28495
  • Run different numbers in the Helix work item #28444
  • Run different numbers in the Helix work item #28446
  • Run different numbers in the Helix work item #28445
